original_text: For they could not endure the order that was given, “If even a beast touches the mountain, it shall be stoned.”
korean_text: 이는 짐승이라도 그 산에 들어가면 돌로 침을 당하리라 하신 명령을 그들이 견디지 못함이라

sentences.original_text: For they could not endure the order
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 명령을 견딜 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: “If even a beast touches the mountain,
